channel.title: Programability on Boldly Going Nowhere

item.title: Devnet Assosciate
item.description: After much procrastination and delay, I’m finally Devnet Assosciate certified!!! I thought it only appropriate to publish a list of resources - there are heaps out there! This list isn’t exhaustive, and there are heaps of other resources out there, but this is what worked for me. Firstly, you have to study the blueprint here. Take note of the keywords like describe, implement, configure, etc. They are the best indication of the depth of the topic that you will need to research.
